arrVal.displayStr:
The Ruins Church - Beta_v0.5.5 - 20250309
Bug Fixes:
Finally fixed audio isolation in study room/church, button to disable/enable in Study Room.
Increased FPS on all platforms with large performance improvements.
Removed games in basement for future replacement while basement is under construction for new purposes.

The Ruins Church - Beta_v0.5.4 - 20250307
Bug Fixes:
Several Performance Improvements

New Features:
Addition of networked content including changelog, upcoming events, and more to come.
Additional low latency streaming screen installed in main church.
Updated ban system.

The Ruins Church - Beta_v0.5.0 - 20250302
Bug Fixes:
Many performance improvements with less stutter due to scripts
Church lighting improvement
Tree visuals improved

New Features:
Completely new basement to church
Tons of toys in the church. (Note these toys will likely be removed from the church when a new home is made for them)
Audio zones installed allowing for basement convos to not be heard in the main church, or study room and so on. These zones are also in most popular areas including both islands, the ruins, and the woods
Pulpit & Lectern boost voice of presenter
New low latency streaming screens installed in study and basement
Even more that I cannot remember...

The Ruins Church - Beta_v0.4.0 - 20250227
Bug Fixes:
FPS Improvements map wide
Church  Lighting Improvements
Map wide tree/bush color improvements
Improvements to some handling scripts that caused CPU spikes

New Features:
Ability to open/close doors... performance improvement when closed
Added new clock asset to back left church room, shows your local time
Thanks to Pastor David - Added swimmable water with underwater shaders and custom controls
Custom texture/shader added to windows on Android/Oculus so you cannot see out improving FPS and QoL

The Ruins Church - Beta_v0.3.4 - 20250226
Performance improvements overall, VR Stability increases (roughly 20FPS+), Added colliders on pipe organ, Added world ban script that will teleport any user to an invisible jailcell with a message that they are banned... It also sets their respawn location there so there is no escape.

The Ruins Church - Beta_v0.3.3 - 20250225
Initial release to community labs... Several bugs found and reported.
